lead_paragraph: Two new books by very different authors agree that the buffoonery on the right is bad not just for conservatism but for America.

headline.print_headline: ‘Why the Right Went Wrong’ and ‘Too Dumb to Fail’
headline.main: ‘Why the Right Went Wrong’ and ‘Too Dumb to Fail’

snippet: Two new books by very different authors agree that the buffoonery on the right is bad not just for conservatism but for America.
abstract: Adrian Wooldridge reviews books Why the Right Went Wrong: Conservatism - From Goldwater to the Tea Party and Beyond by E J Dionne Jr and Too Dumb to Fail: How the GOP Betrayed the Reagan Revolution to Win Elections (and How It Can Reclaim Its Conservative Roots) by Matt K Lewis.
